flex2.tools

Class ToolsConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • flex2.compiler.common.Configuration
      • flex2.tools.ToolsConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LinkerConfiguration, Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplicationCompilerConfiguration, CommandLineConfiguration, CompcConfiguration, LinkerConfiguration

    public abstract class ToolsConfiguration
extends Configuration
    Common base class for most tool specific configurations.
